title: The Atlantic community: introducing Belgium
creator_credit: North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Ytzen Brusse
brief_description: Describes the country and the people of Belgium - geographical features, historical development and achievements, economic life, occupations of the people, and social customs. Explains briefly the role of Belgium in NATO.
